summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.2°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles) and dew point temperature (up 3.3°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 332m and a high of 1648m, averaging 1126.6m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; sweltering, especially in sunny spots. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and breezy at times. Chance of light rain, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather will likely remain the same.
